== Debugging GWT applications Debugging a GWT application in development mode is easy. In this case you can just debug the Java code. Put a breakpoint into your code and start the debugger via selecting your project, right-click -> debug as -> Web Application.
You can then use standard Eclipse debugging capabilities. Please see http://www.vogella.com/tutorials/EclipseDebugging/article.html"> Eclipse Debugging for details.
